tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Allele (
  allele_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  generation_id INT,
  allele_name VARCHAR(50),
  frequency FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (generation_id) REFERENCES Generation(generation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AlleleFrequencyGenerations (
  generation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  allele_A_frequency FLOAT,
  allele_B_frequency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE PopulationDetails (
  population_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  population_name VARCHAR(50),
  population_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE MutationEvents (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  generation_id INT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GenerationStatistics (
  stat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  generation_id INT,
  mean_allele_frequency FLOAT,
  variance_allele_frequency FLOAT
)
